subject: Amazon Order: 114-7333728-9470668
description_text:
Hi Simsonn,

I hit a request to cancel on accident on this Amazon order. Please continue
to ship it if you can.

Thanks, Kaden

conversations.body_text: Hi Kaden Ly,  Alright, I will inform our Amazon operations team to resume the shipment for you. Thank you for your support.
Sounds good thanks, do you know how long the shipment will take?

Hi Kaden Ly,  Sorry. Our Amazon colleague acted so quickly; he had already cancelled your order by the time we notified him. Could you please reorder? We will ship your order from our US warehouse immediately.
No problem, I just re ordered it. Here is order number: 114-7038728-5380227

Hi Kaden Ly,  OK. Thanks. We have shipped it, here is your tracking number: 887920088042,   ships from US warehouse, the shipping carrier is FedEx, you can track it via https://www.fedex.com/fedextrack
